entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of snow or drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
